reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweatshirt comfortable, well-made, and perfect for cold weather, with one noting it provides warmth without being heavy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Casual
items.body: I love this sweater! It is cute and cozy. The perfect slightly oversized look for crisp fall mornings! I’ve had it for over a year and the color is still vibrant and beautiful. No fading. The material is thick and cozy and you can dress it up or down depending on the event. A staple in my fall/winter wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Kelly Sohner

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS HOODIE
items.body: I love this! My daughter in law bought me one in a solid color and I liked it so much, I picked it up in navy stripe. Looks great with white jeans. It's soft and comfy and not-too-warm, just right for fall days. Perfectly sized for my usual size. The solid one washed up beautifully and I'm assuming the striped one will as well. Buy it, you won't regret it! Read more
items.author: Gottaluvlabs

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice fit
items.body: I like the look and feel of the sweatshirt. I was not crazy about the shade of green when I received it but that is not the manufacturer’s fault. Otherwise a nice top and I will keep it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfy
items.body: I really like my sweaters I bought two for fall. nice colors. love the comfy fit. washed up nice. Very Casual and comfy! Not really heavy for warmth. but perfect for a nice fall day Read more
items.author: Scarlet

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality.
items.body: This is a great quality sweater. It is somewhat heavier sweater. Very soft. Fits perfect and true to size. Love it! Read more
items.author: SCD

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfy but flimsy
items.body: Comfy, soft, light, loose fit, and mostly warm. Don’t walk past anything that it might catch on. I literally had it unravel because I caught it on a countertop corner. Read more
items.author: Tiffany

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: Comfortable, well made, olive (army) green is a beautiful shade. Very soft. Read more
items.author: Debbie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: Great fall sweater! Soft and cozy. Fits true to size Read more
items.author: Donna

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: C Green Stripe, B Peacock Blue, B Gray, C Stripe Navy Blue, C Red Stripe, A Green, B Black, F Christmas Black 1, B Caramel, B Denim Blue, B Apricot, C Stripe Apricot, F Christmas Red 1, B Bluish Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
